::KitKat::

She thought for a moment. "My little snake bot? I never call 
Quickstrike by that name? How on Cybertron did I think up a name like 
that? the only one who used that name was the mind reading 
horse....." her voice trailed off and she realized she had been 
dooped.

"BLAST HER!"  She ran back to the base and sniffed around.  she went 
outside and sniffed the air.  She caught her scent.  "hmm, she can 
read minds huh?  I'll show her."  She followed the scent trail till 
it was very strong.  She knew that the mare was around somewhere.
She filled her mind with pictures of whole herds of horses being 
slaughted every which way possable.  Grusome and grotesque pictures 
of horses being killed one at a time and as a whole group.

"That aught to do the trick."  With a smile on her face, she went off 
back to the base.
